scripts.build: vite build && cp -r prompts-site-webflow-export/personal dist/personal && cp -r prompts-site-webflow-export/work dist/work && cp -r prompts-site-webflow-export/css dist/css && cp -r prompts-site-webflow-export/images dist/images && cp -r prompts-site-webflow-export/js dist/js && cp -r prompts-site-webflow-export/documents dist/documents
